meanings.definition: The bejeezus (noun): Used as an exclamation to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: Oh bejeezus, I can't believe I won the lottery!
meanings.sent2: She shouted 'bejeezus' when she saw the huge cake.
meanings.sent3: When the cat knocked over the vase, Mom exclaimed 'bejeezus!'
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm scared the bejeezus out of the little puppy.
meanings.sent5: The magician's disappearing act made the audience gasp 'bejeezus'.

meanings.definition: Bejeezus (verb): To scare or startle someone greatly.
meanings.sent1: The sudden loud noise bejeezused the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: Don't sneak up on me like that, you really bejeezused me!
meanings.sent3: The prankster loved to bejeezus his friends by jumping out from behind doors.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie bejeezused the audience with its unexpected twists.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour guide knew how to bejeezus visitors with spooky stories.
